${ModID}:BoosterPack.NAME: Booster Pack
${ModID}:BoosterPack.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random ${ModID}:different color cards into your hand. Give them Ethereal.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The cards generated by this card are weighted towards being lower rarity.

${ModID}:StarShower.NAME: Star Shower
${ModID}:StarShower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. The next time you play a ${ModID}:different color Attack this turn, repeat this.

${ModID}:Paintcan.NAME: Paintcan
${ModID}:Paintcan.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Cards in your hand become a ${ModID}:different color.

${ModID}:PortalPunch.NAME: Portal Punch
${ModID}:PortalPunch.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Add {!M!|@=a|>1=!M!} random ${ModID}:different color {!M!|@=card|>1=cards} into your hand. Give {!M!|@=it|>1=them} Ethereal.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The cards generated by this card are weighted towards being lower rarity.

${ModID}:EnchantedRift.NAME: Enchanted Rift
${ModID}:EnchantedRift.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL Add a copy of the last ${ModID}:different color card played into your hand. Give it Ethereal.

${ModID}:Fetch.NAME: Fetch!
${ModID}:Fetch.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL The next time you play a ${ModID}:different color Skill this turn, repeat this. Exhaust.
${ModID}:Fetch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL The next time you play a ${ModID}:different color Skill this turn, repeat this.

${ModID}:NeutronStar.NAME: Neutron Star
${ModID}:NeutronStar.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary Strength. NL The next time you play a ${ModID}:different color attack this turn, repeat this. Exhaust.
${ModID}:NeutronStar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary Strength. NL The next time you play a ${ModID}:different color attack this turn, repeat this.

${ModID}:FastHands.NAME: Fast Hands
${ModID}:FastHands.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Put a random ${ModID}:different color card from your draw pile into your hand. Exhaust.
${ModID}:FastHands.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Put a random ${ModID}:different color card from your draw pile into your hand.

${ModID}:DimensionBreach.NAME: Dimension Breach
${ModID}:DimensionBreach.DESCRIPTION: Play !M! random ${ModID}:different color attacks on the enemy. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The cards generated by this card are weighted towards being lower rarity.

${ModID}:CosmicConverter.NAME: Cosmic Converter
${ModID}:CosmicConverter.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, add a ${ModID}:different color card of the same type and cost as the last card played into your hand.
